text: @atrupar #Trump is to Chicken Shit to take HCQ. Don the Con who doesn’t believe in test makes sure he gets #COVID19 tested morning, noon and night because #POTUS is scared Shitless about catching #Coronavirus  People who listen to this piece of shit deserve what they get #TrumpIsAnIdiot

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
